image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from Illinois; born in Carrollton, Greene County, Ill., October 26, 1891; elected as a Republican to the Eighty-sixth Congress (January 3, 1959-January 3, 1961); did not seek renomination in 1960; died on May 15, 1984, in Carrollton, Ill.; interment at Carrollton City Cemetery, Carrollton, Ill.

asset.name: S000430_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: "Edna O. Simpson" in Women in Congress, 1917-2006. Prepared under the direction of the Committee on House Administration by the Office of History & Preservation, U.S. House of Representatives. Washington: Government Printing Office, 2006.
